name: Stone Tucker Instruments
tag_list: coatings-inspection-equipment, ndt-inspection, nde-inspection, coating-thickness-gauges, paint-test-equipment, quality-assurance-instruments, instrument-calibration-and-repair, surface-test-products
overview:
Stone Tucker Instruments is Canada’s leading supplier of Coatings Inspection and Test Equipment.

Stone Tucker Instruments’ president, Bob Tucker, is a NACE-certified Coatings Inspector with Marine Coatings Specialization and extensive industry experience. NACE-trained Technical Sales Representative Jason Tucker comes with multi-disciplinary NDE field experience.

Stone Tucker Instruments is Canada’s primary distributor for many of the world’s top manufacturers of Coatings Inspection Equipment, including DeFelsko, PCWI porosity detectors, Testex, ChlorRid, and the MBX Bristle Blaster. In addition, Stone Tucker Instruments offers a wide range of NDT instruments such as Dakota Ultrasonics, Western Instruments magnetic particle equipment and pit gauges, GAL Gage, and others.

Stone Tucker Instruments is committed to providing excellent customer service, including repair and calibration, timely delivery facilitated by the wide range of in-stock products, and the expertise of industry training and experience.
